title: Trump Says US Companies Will Rebuild Venezuelan Oil Infrastructure
description: President Donald Trump said American oil companies will “spend billions of dollars” to fix oil infrastructure in Venezuela following the capture of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro by US forces in an early morning raid Saturday. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: President Donald Trump said American oil companies will “spend billions of dollars” to fix oil infrastructure in Venezuela following the capture of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro by US forces in an early morning raid Saturday. (Source: Bloomberg)
